title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 ยง 256.15 - Interior inspections-water-seal holders
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 ยง 256.15 - Interior inspections-water-seal holders

State Regulations

After a long period of continuous use, not to exceed 20
years, physical tests shall be made upon specimens cut from the thin material
of the crown plating, or after a period of continuous service, not to exceed 25
years, the tank shall be de-watered and a thorough interior inspection made of
the condition of the shell, steel work, the internal rollers, and the permanent
frame. The holder shall not be restored to service until the necessary
preliminary precautions and the repairs as indicated by the inspection have
been made. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16
ยง
256.15

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
